Supervisor Assignment of Master Taught Course Project (20242025-1)
==================================================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Oct 24, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/MASTERPROJECTIKLAN2425-1-1080x441.jpg)

Attention to all students taking Project 1 ME\*\* 1814/MKE\* 1814 in semester 1 session 20242025. The list of project supervisor assignments for each program can be found at the following link for each program.

1.  [Master of Engineering in Wireless Communication and Network](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/SV-Assignment-Finale-20242025-1-MKET.pdf)
    
2.  [Master of Engineering (Electrical Power)](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/SV-Assignment-Finale-20242025-1-MEEP.pdf)
    
3.  [Master of Engineering (Mechatronics and Automatic Control)](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/SV-Assignment-Finale-20242025-1-MEEM.pdf)
    
4.  [Master of Engineering (Computer and Microelectronic Systems)](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/SV-Assignment-Finale-20242025-1-MKEH.pdf)
    
5.  [Master of Science (Biomedical Engineering)](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/SV-Assignment-Finale-20242025-1-MEBC.pdf)
    

Please contact your respective supervisor via the email address provided for abstract details.

Meanwhile, please take note the action that should be taken during the Master project can be found at the following link: [Project Research Schedule](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/project-research-schedules/)
Â  (to be updated)

Regularly check the FKE Postgraduate website for updates.

Thank you.
